name: DATT 2300 Endless Runner
description:
DATT 2300 Project 3 Endless Runner Game : THe Rogue One

Controls:

SPACE : jump

Q : powerup

ESC : quit game

Assets Used:

Oak Woods — Environment Asset 🍂 by brullov - used for parallax background and used tileset asset for the floor

Pixel Adventure by Pixel Frog - used animated collectible sprites (fruits)

Generic RPG pack by Estúdio Vaca Roxa - used music

https://github.com/andersonaddo/EZ-Camera-Shake-Unity - camera shake movement

Sound effects Pack 2 by Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment - used coin collect sound sound fx

Huntress by LuizMelo - huntress player sprite
